title: Piers Morgan: Attacks on the Trump Presidency Are 'Un-American'
text:
7 P 
Inside Flynn's conversations with Russia, what he told the administration and why it cost him his job. The First 100 Days breaks down every angle with Dana Perino , Rep. Sean Duffy and Marc Thiessen . 8 P 
Despite all the controversy, President Trump's approval ratings are rising. A must-see O'Reilly Factor explores why. 10 P

Trey Gowdy (R-S.C.) believes issues with President Donald Trump's executive order barring immigration from seven Muslim-majority countries can be "easily remedied."
